text:
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
URBANA, ILLINOIS
RADIO STATION WILL
August 4, 1952
t--
Mr. James S. Miles
Executive Director, NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Dear Jim:
According to dope I have, we*re to have
15,000 special JEFFERSONIAN series brochures, leaflets,
or promotional pieces.
If available, I request an additional 5000.
We*11 be glad to pay the bill. We can even issue
requisition. I want everyone on the faculty to get one,
along with our regular and special mailings.
oley
Station Manager
FES:fmh
cc: Sy Siegel
Harold E. Hill
J
